info.name: Pandora Minimal
info.description: A basic and minimal Pandora theme. This theme includes an animated gradient background with a large album picture in the center. The minimal controls are shown and the station list can be shown by hovering on the left side of the screen.
info.additionalInfo:
Release 1.0 - 3/9/2017
 - Animated gradient background
 - Large album picture
 - Recoloring of all basic text and buttons
 - Beautified text
 - Station list appears on hover
 - Station list stretch to fit whole left side
 - Remove visual ads and promo box
 - Other minor removal of items
